response.overview: A celebration of the resilience and bravery of Jeffrey Dudgeon and Northern Ireland’s queer activists who defiantly faced the police and courts to pave the way for a more open and progressive Northern Ireland.
response.tagline: A celebration of the resilience and bravery of Jeffrey Dudgeon and Northern Ireland’s queer activists who defiantly faced the police and courts to pave the way for a more open and progressive Northern Ireland.
response.title: Outlasting
